Magic Notes:
Art Of Magic: +1 character level for max spell level
Bonus Spell Energy: +11 Spell Energy
Bonus Spells: +20 Channeler Spells
Magecraft (Hermetic): Learn 3 W0 and 1 W1 spells, 4 Spell Energy
Spellcasting (Abjuration): Learn 1 Channeler Abjuration spell; may learn more
Spellcasting (Divination): Learn 1 Channeler Divination spell; may learn more
Spellcasting (Illusion): Learn 1 Channeler Illusion spell; may learn more
Spellcasting (Necromancy): Learn 1 Channeler Necromancy spell; may learn more
Craft Spell Talisman: Reduces spell energy cost of chosen spell by 1
Craft Wondrous Item: Create and mend miscellaneous magic items
Quicken Spell: Free action casting 1/rd uses +4 spell slot
Still Spell: Cast spell w/out movement uses +1 spell slot
Companions
Familiar: Bat "Hitu"
Str: 1 (-5) Dex: 15 (+2) Con: 10 (+0) Int: 11 (+0) Wis: 14 (+2) Cha: 4 (-3) Size: D
HD/HP: 11/36 Init: +2 AC: 22 Attack: +8 0 Fort/Ref/Will: +3/+5/+9
Familiar Features: Companion Alertness; Companion Evasion; Companion Improved Evasion; Companion Spell Resistance; Deliver Touch Spells; Empathic Link; Share Spells; Speak With Like Animals; Speak With Master
Companion Notes:
Companion Evasion: Reflex save yields no damage instead of half
Companion Improved Evasion: Failed save yields half damage
Deliver Touch Spells: Deliver touch spells if in contact w/master when cast
Empathic Link: Share emotions w/in 1 mile
Share Spells: R5' Master share self spell w/companion
Speak With Like Animals: Talk w/similar creatures
Speak With Master: Talk w/master in secret language
